title: Digital and Sustainable Transition Leadership Competency Development Program for Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic digital technologies and awareness of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
context.additional_context: Customized microlearning modules in a BYOD environment, developing digital/environmental/social integrated competencies aligned with the Industry 5.0 paradigm

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the core principles of Industry 5.0 and develop a framework for applying them to organizational strategies.
Learners can design and implement practical projects linking digital transformation tools with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
Learners can apply a systematic model to evaluate digital-environmental-social integrated solutions through stakeholder collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
